price: 7 que l’Heure sonnera inéluctablement et qu’Allah ressuscitera les morts dans leurs tombes.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-sāʿata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-anna al-laha yabʿathu man fī al-qubūri
